definition: Taiwan pr. used in 夾生|夹生[jia1 sheng1] and 夾竹桃|夹竹桃[jia1 zhu2 tao2]
to press from either side/to place in between/to sandwich/to carry sth under armpit/wedged between/between/to intersperse/to mix/to mingle/clip/folder/Taiwan pr. [jia2]
tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten

sentences.english: The paper introduced the working principle and design calculation of the clamp frames for cement bonded particle board production.
sentences.chinese: 介绍水泥刨花板夹紧框架的工作原理和设计思路。

sentences.english: Should adjust the spacing so that the splint splint can clamp back.
sentences.chinese: 对此应调整夹板间距，使夹板能夹紧书背。

sentences.english: They are calling it the "decussate thighs" strike.
sentences.chinese: 这是一场被称为“夹紧双腿”的罢工运动。

sentences.english: Glue them together and wrap with plastic wrap, clamp tightly and let dry.
sentences.chinese: 一起胶合他们和套与塑料套，紧紧夹紧并且让干燥。

sentences.english: And clamp is the device of the wedge.
sentences.chinese: 夹具则是采用了楔块夹紧装置。

sentences.english: She squeezed the clamp shut, closing off the vessels in the pedicle.
sentences.chinese: 她夹紧手术夹，封闭住肝蒂上的血管。

sentences.english: Afterwards the pipes will have to be secured against axial displacement by means of a clamping device.
sentences.chinese: 然后管材必需通过夹紧装置成轴向的转移。

sentences.english: Improved gasket design allows sealing at lower clamping pressures.
sentences.chinese: 改善密封垫片的设计可以以较低的夹紧压力。

sentences.english: The eccentric wheel clamping can be disassembled under the condition that the surface is rusted.
sentences.chinese: 偏心轮夹紧，在表面锈蚀条件下仍可拆卸。

sentences.english: Once the renal hilum is clamped, the J-hook electrocautery is used to circumferentially incise the renal capsule.
sentences.chinese: 一旦夹紧肾门，用J钩电烙器在周围切开肾包膜。

sentences.english: Keeping the whole thing glued and clamped together with liberal sprinklings of masking tape!
sentences.chinese: 把所有的东西粘起来并且把他们夹紧。

sentences.english: So, it 's possible to repeat an applied torque for any required clamping force .
sentences.chinese: 因此，有可能重复应用扭矩产生任何所需的夹紧力。

sentences.english: Bill clamped the horn to the handlebar of his bicycle.
sentences.chinese: 比尔把喇叭夹紧在脚踏车的龙头上。

sentences.english: Wraps are clamped by suitable straps in three points.
sentences.chinese: 在三处合适的地方使用束带将包装材料夹紧固牢。

sentences.english: Schaeffler also supplies suitable fasteners such as clamping lugs for mounting of the unit.
sentences.chinese: 舍弗勒还提供适当的紧固件，如夹紧派的安装单位。

sentences.english: A dual optimization model of fixture layout and dynamic clamping forces has been established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了夹具布局和变夹紧力分层优化模型。

definition: to draw together/to place side by side (e.g. one's fingers, two halves of a torn sheet of paper etc)
to release/to let go/to loosen/to untie/to come loose
to fasten tightly with a hoop
to stick close to/to press up against
to straighten one's back/to arch one's back
